p.s: The article Globalised Environmental Pollution - Causes and Effects by Ankita Mitra, published by Blog on Environment on 5 February 2014 deals with the development of our world on how this increases the pollution.
By developing harmful pollutants the environment gets worser and with that the living conditions of living beings.

With the increasing urbanisation and industrialization, which the human being achieved with science, the results we got are polluted sea, unhealthy air and a lot of animals threatened with extinction or losing their habitat.
The environmental pollution is caused by the fall-out from nuclear test, by the vehicular traffic, nitrogen fertilizers and the use of synthetic detergents.
